--- layout: datasheet title: AssetGuard Instrument description: Automated inventory of the network's assets and alerting about the unexpected assets entering the network. ---

Asset Guard provides visibility to the network assets by monitoring network traffic and gathering identities from it. It provides tools for detecting and naming new assets in the specified networks, sending alerts for suspicious assets and exporting all network assets with various observations collected from them.

Components

Asset Guard consists from two main components: Manager and Probe. Probes listen to the mirrored network traffic and reports its findings to the Manager. It wonâ€™t send anything making it ideal for the OT networks as well. Monitoring multiple networks and physical locations is easy just by deploying multiple probes. Manager then collects the results to the central location and allows reviewing new assets, naming them and for example examining their MAC and IP addresses, manufacturers and traffic amounts.

Properties

Developer SensorFleet Oy
Categories Integrity Monitoring, Asset Tracking
Network access type None
Required interfaces None
Dependencies None
Related Instruments AssetProbe
Data retention AssetGuard Instrument keeps the collected information up to configured retention period
Management UI Yes
